articles.title: Floral basket from ITF president
articles.content:
Floral basket from ITF president
    Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Choe Hong Hui, president of the International Taekwon-do Federation, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Vienna on July 8, the 5th anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung's passing away.    He said that President Kim Il Sung is the savior of the Korean nation, who was held in high esteem for the first time in the nation's history, and the greatest of great men and sages, who was acclaimed by humankind for the first time.

articles.title: Military provocation flailed by Danish political figure
articles.content:
Military provocation flailed by Danish political figure
    Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the central committee of the Communist Party of Denmark (Marxist-Leninist), Jorgen Peterson, in his letter  sent to the Korean ambassador to Denmark over  the incident in the West Sea of Korea on June 28, said   that the South Korean authorities attempt to  ignite a war again,  stressing that his party  bitterly denounces their military provocations.   He  noted that the west sea incident caused by the South Korean authorities shows clearly that the "sunshine policy" on their lips  is nothing but an spurious signboard which gives no help to the Korean people.

articles.title: Arms buildup in S. Korea
articles.content:
Arms buildup in S. Korea
   Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The South Korean authorities are scheming to deploy "the latest 155 mm self-propelled gun KX9" in Paekryong Islet in October, a news report from Seoul said.   Such lethal weapons are said to be deployed for action at the marine corps of the "'ROK' army" in the islet to "cope with military provocations."  The issue of deployment is under consideration, said an official of the South Korean "Defence Ministry" Sunday, claiming the "northern limit line" which has been recognized by nobody.   This fully reveals war hysteria of the South Korean war hawks who are seeking to justify the unilaterally fixed "northern limit line" and intensify aggression and confrontation moves by turning this area into a base for naval operation to invade the north.

Co-articles of Rodong Sinmun and Kulloja reported
articles.content:
Co-articles of Rodong Sinmun and Kulloja reported
   Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A reading meeting on "let us reject imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning", a co-article of Rodong Sinmun and Kulloja was held by the National Movement of the Genuine Lumumbist Combatants of  Democratic Congo on June 22.   The national chairman of the national movement in the meeting said that the DPRK, which  gives top priority to the ideological work, is an impregnable country into which any ideas cannot be infiltrated.   Meanwhile, briefings on "invincible is the Worker's Party of Korea's high-priority army politics", a co-article of Rodong Sinmun and Kulloja, were held at the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Madagascar and the Madagascan Society for the Study of Kim Jong Il's works on June 25 and 28.

Floral basket from Fidel Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Floral basket from Fidel Castro Ruz
   Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A floral basket came from Fidel Castro Ruz, first secretary of the central committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State  and  president of the Council of Ministers, on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung's passing away.   Jose Manuel Inclan Embade, Cuban ambassador E.P. to Korea, and members of the embassy laid the floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on July 12.

articles.title: Kim Yong Sun meets delegation of Koreans from China
articles.content:
Kim Yong Sun meets delegation of Koreans from China
   Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Secretary Kim Yong Sun of the central committee of the Worker's Party of Korea met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with the delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China led by chairman Yang Yong Dong at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.   On the occasion the head of the delegation said that the future of the country is bright as it is led by the Marshal Kim Jong Il. He expressed his determination to devote himself to national reunification and the patriotic work, holding the respected Marshal in high esteem with loyalty.
